characters.name: Loonboss Joey
characters.description: Loon boss joey is a pretty swell guy who likes to chill out at home when he doesnt have to go to work and kill invaders or spiders

characters.name: Shaman Billy
characters.description: Works as the doctor in the caves, but he rarely manages to cure anything without the help of his mushrooms.

characters.name: Skragrott, King of all
characters.description: King of the goblins, and incredibly cunning.

characters.name: Dock Ock
characters.description: Often described as unnecesairly cruel, he has a tendency to let his patients leave with more diseases than when they came in.

characters.name: Sicky Boy
characters.description: A sergeant within the army, he often enters the battlefield with one hand on his gun and one up his nose.

characters.name: Little Big Guy
characters.description: Mortarion, leader of the deathguard. Forsaken by his father, he found a loving family in the deepest recesses of the void.
